transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan, good evening Prakash ji, main Aakanksha IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hoon. Kaise hain?
Customer: Ji badhiya hai.
Executive: Uh, sir woh aapne customer care pe call kiya tha na woh keyword promotion ke liye domain name ka?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh woh approval mil gaya hai, theek hai? Toh woh aapka kya bolte hain, jo aapke according jo bhi aapki discussion hui hai na, us wajah se uske according services aapke live ho jayenge, theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Domain name ka. Haan, jo keyword basis pe aapne hatane ke liye bola tha na?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan, woh approval mil gaya hai, woh uske according kaam kiya jayega abhi, theek hai? Toh main yeh ticket close kar rahi hoon abhi. Aur koi issue hai toh bataiye?
Customer: Aur koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Ek kaam kar lijiyega, aapke na kuch active products na inactive listing se bahut pade hue hain, same jo active mein bhi pada hai. Usko please delete kar lijiyega, theek hai? Kyunki repeat hua listing bahut sare pade hain.
Customer: Woh delete kaise hoga?
Executive: Inactive mein jaakar. Uh, abhi app pe hain aap? App pe hain aap?
Customer: Haan, main app par login kar liya.
Executive: Login kar lijiye ek baar.
Customer: Kar liya.
Executive: App pe jaakar manage product pe jaiye.
Customer: Manage product mein aisa ho jata hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Pahunch gaya.
Executive: Manage product mein jaakar abhi right side ke teen dot mein dekhiye deactivated listings aapko dikh raha hoga ya rejected ya inactive. Right side ke teen dot pe.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, us pe click kariye, kitne dikh rahe hain aapko deactivated mein?
Customer: Isme toh kai aate hain ji.
Executive: Kitna? 40?
Customer: 40 dikh rahe hain kya?
Executive: Haan, 40 dikh rahe hain na? Pehla wala product aapko semi-automatic soap stamping machine yahi dikh raha hai kya deactivated mein?
Customer: Semi-automatic soap stamping machine nahi dikh raha.
Executive: Haan, yahi dikh raha hai na? Abhi niche edit wale symbol pe click karo, edit pe likha hoga niche edit pe click karo.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uh, uske right side pe teen dot pe likha hoga deactivate, activate ya delete aisa kuch likha hoga.
Customer: Haan, delete ho gaya.
Executive: Haan, aap isme se yeh 40 listing mein na sare check kar lena kaun se active karne hain aur kaun se delete karne hain. Aapka ek product jo hai na active mein bhi pada hai aur inactive mein pada hai toh ek baar dekh lijiyega agar do baar list kiya gaya hai toh usko delete kar lijiyega inactive mein jitne bhi pade hain. Theek hai? Baaki koi aapke paas isko active karna hai toh usko activate kara lijiyega. Uh, iske alawa sir aap apna ratings jo hai na woh ratings pe ek baar theek kar lijiyega. Kyunki aapka ratings jo hai, ek minute main bata rahi hoon kitna hai. 4.7 hai. 39 logon ne review kiya hua hai. Theek hai? Toh ratings kaise request karna hai woh pata hai kya? Sorry, aapko review link kaise bhejna hai?
Customer: Pata hai mujhe par rating toh ek hi hai.
Executive: Haan, matlab 4.7 hai. Sorry, response rate apna theek kare na, 67% hai response rate. Matlab jo calls aa rahi hai woh kuch aap attend nahi kar rahe hain. Theek hai? Aapka October mein lagbhag do call aapka attend nahi hua hai. Ek baar aur September mein saat call, matlab har mahine paanch se saat call aapko attend nahi ho raha hai. Theek hai? Toh yeh jo 980 last mein jo number hai yeh kiske paas hai?
Customer: 980.
Executive: Haan, last mein jo 980 hai.
Customer: Yeh toh mere paas pada hai.
Executive: Achha, yeh number use mein nahi hai? Yeh actually is pe non-office hours pe. Yeh do number hatana hai hume.
Executive: Aap settings wale tab pe jaiye, settings wale pe.
Customer: Settings pe jayenge na, PNS setting, preferred number setting likha hoga dekhiye.
Customer: Preferred number setting mein aapko haan, aap dekh lo yeh teesra number jo hai aap bol rahe ho woh.
Customer: Mere paas wale jo do number hai na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Last mein 684 aur ek 94 hai woh use mein hai toh usko active kar lo.
Customer: Ek minute check karta hoon isme kaun se number hai madam. Yeh 39 active hai. Last mein jo 980 hai na yeh toh theek hai. Are baad ke active kar lo off mein pade hain.
Customer: Woh toh active hai par yeh 684 aur 894 yeh dono number hatane hai yahan se mujhe.
Executive: Woh toh waise bhi off pada hai sir, call toh waise bhi nahi jayega us pe.
Customer: Haan toh kaun se do numberon par hi chahiye. 428 wale. Haan, main main toh do number hi hai aapka aur yeh jo off mein pada hai na isme koi customer call bhi karega toh call lagega nahi off mein hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Woh ek ek select karke usko delete kar. Haan, do number active pada hai already.
Executive: Yeh dusra aap bol rahe hain na use mein nahi hai toh usko bhi aap off kar lo.
Customer: Use mein nahi hai number.
Customer: Ab yeh delete ka toh isme koi option hi nahi aata.
Executive: Woh select karo, check box select karne ka option aa raha hai?
Customer: Yahan pe number aapko dikh rahe hain wahan pe left side mein dekhiye check box ko select karne ka option aa raha hai?
Customer: Select karte hain toh number change karne ka aa jata hai.
Executive: Hmm. Achha.
Executive: Wohi se hoga delete. Aap jab system pe login karenge na ek baar mujhe call kar lena main guide kar dungi, theek hai? System pe agar login hoga toh.
Customer: Chhodo inhe, yeh toh deactivate hi hai.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Active toh hai hi nahi yeh number tere.
Executive: Haan, wohi active hai nahi waise koi dikkat hai nahi, haan. Theek hai, main aapko yeh ticket jo hai na woh close kar rahi hoon. Aapko rating ka link aayega us pe rate kar dijiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aapka website live ho gaya, check kar liya na aapne?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed assistance with keyword promotion.

- Wants to delete inactive product listings.

- Wants to remove two phone numbers from settings.

- Ratings and response rate need improvement.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed keyword promotion approval.

- Guided customer to delete inactive listings.

- Guided customer to check ratings and response rate.

- Offered to guide customer on system login.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check and delete inactive listings.

- Customer to check ratings and response rate.

- Customer can call after system login for assistance.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- keyword promotion, inactive listings, ratings, response rate, phone number settings
